name: Dorohedoro, Vol. 4 and above
blurb: I like this series but only have the first 3 books.

name: Dell S Series LED-lit Monitor
blurb: I'd like to get a larger monitor for my computer. Price for this particular one varies as availability varies.

name: Saris Bones 2 Bike Rack
blurb: I'd like a bike rack for my car. You can get this locally from the bike shop down the street, Bycicles Inc.

name: CZ 75 B Omega Convertible
blurb: It's a gun I want. Pretty pricey so cash gift to contribute would be fine.

name: Parts for my PC
blurb: I'd like to do an upgrade for my desktop computer. It will take me about $1,000 to get it to where I want it. Any cash gifts would be fine.
